messages.title: Climate Change and Inequality
messages.content: Lib Dems in Government. The Lib Dems have slashed bills for the poorest pensioners and young unemployed people, are planting a million more trees, and have made rigs pay tax.

messages.title: Stop School Closures
messages.content: Lib Dems protect our schools and hospitals - Tories and Labour don't.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have worked to push the government further on environmental sustainability.

issues.environment: Lib Dems in Government pushing for environmental sustainability.
issues.health: Lib Dems protect our schools and hospitals.
issues.socialWelfare: Lib Dems have slashed bills for the poorest pensioners and young unemployed people.

quotes.text: Labour will be tougher than Tories on benefits.
Labour is ... not allowing schools to profit.

images.caption: Images of people and statements related to Liberal Democrat campaign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet presents criticisms of the Labour MP and contrasts with Liberal Democrat achievements and policies.
